thread.title: A quaint wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: A quaint wonderful hotel - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Victoria Maria ... N
title: A quaint wonderful hotel
text:
I am definitely very very very impressed by this quaint hotel in the main district of Paris. It is really spacious and the service is just superb! I felt so welcomed by the hotel staff and they made you feel at home immediately. And thanks to the great recommendation of the best Chinese restuarant in Paris.
I also need to mention that there was a night I was craving for a glass of milk to go with my muffin. As it was Sunday, 22 January 2017, all the supermarket was closed. The gentleman at the counter went to get a glass of milk for me from the hotel pantry! I was really touched.
I am sorry to say I did not get his name but he reminded me of Jeremy Irons :). Thank you so much to you and your colleagues for the great time and I'll definitely be back soon :)
